data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Describe the last time you listened to live music. Where were you, and how was the experience? Do you prefer listening to live music or recorded music? Why?
data.answer: I like pop music very much. The tune gives me energy. I went to see Jay Chou’s concert in Nanjing last year. He is one of the most popular singers in China. I felt really touched when we all sang together with him in the stadium. Speaking of live music or recorded music, I do not really have a preference. It depends on who is playing. Usually, recordings are much cheaper; the voices are better. However, live performances are exciting, especially when the artists talk to the audience, and everyone cheers and claps. It can create some fresh feelings. (99 字)
